import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Drop irrelevant columns: Name, Ticket
X_train = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived', 'Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Handle missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
X_train['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X_train['Sex'])
X_train['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(X_train['Embarked'])

# Feature engineering
X_train['FamilySize'] = X_train['SibSp'] + X_train['Parch'] + 1
X_train['IsAlone'] = (X_train['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Prepare test data
test_df = test_df.drop(['Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1)
test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)

# Apply same encoding to test data
test_df['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(test_df['Sex'])
test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

# Feature engineering in test
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Train model
model = GradientBoostingClassifier(n_estimators=200, learning_rate=0.1, max_depth=3, random_state=42)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict
y_pred = model.predict(test_df)

# Create submission
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'PassengerId': test_df.index + 891,
    'Survived': y_pred
})

submission.to_cs

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Drop irrelevant columns: Name, Ticket, Cabin
X_train = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived', 'Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Handle missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
X_train['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X_train['Sex'])

# Feature engineering
X_train['FamilySize'] = X_train['SibSp'] + X_train['Parch'] + 1
X_train['IsAlone'] = (X_train['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Prepare test data
test_df = test_df.drop(['Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'], axis=1)
test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

})

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Drop irrelevant columns: Name, Ticket, Cabin
X_train = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived', 'Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Handle missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

le_embarked = LabelEncoder()
X_train['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X_train['Sex'])
X_train['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(X_train['Embarked'])

# Feature engineering
X_train['FamilySize'] = X_train['SibSp'] + X_train['Parch'] + 1
X_train['IsAlone'] = (X_train['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Prepare test data
test_df = test_df.drop(['Name', 'Ticket', 'Cabin'], axis=1)
test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

test_df['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

# Feature engineering in test
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Train model

    'PassengerId': test_df.index + 891,
    'Survived': y_pred
})

import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
